channel.title: Voting for BAY on next.exchange
channel.description:
Hi guys,
just wanted to let you know i've added BAY to the list of suggestions on the "next.exchange" website. They are holding a vote for coins which should be added to their platform once it is launching in jan.2018. I am not on Twitter etc. so maybe someone can spread the word. Let's show some Love!
Link: nextexchange.featureupvote.com

item.title: Voting for BAY on next.exchange
item.dc:creator: @BizzyTheKid Joe
item.description:
@BizzyTheKid wrote:

You are right, just checked on my phone where i added it:
it says “awaiting approval” so i hope a mod there will confirm it asap

Read full topic

i also couldn’t find it?

item.title: Voting for BAY on next.exchange
item.dc:creator: @Mantrack
item.description:
@Mantrack wrote:

Hi, thanks for the appreciation @BizzyTheKid! Although I couldn’t find Bitbay in the suggestion despite searching for it with the search bar and control+f.
Anyway thank you for the suggestion to get on this new exchange!

Read full topic
